title: Find the surface area
text: The surface area can be found with $$(2*pi)*\int_{a}^{b} f{\left(x\right)} \sqrt{1+{\operatorname{f'}\left(x\right)}^2} \,dx$$, where f'(x) indicates the derivative of f(x). We need to plug f(x) and intervals into this equation
